core_principles: Fusion: Traditional Nepali aesthetics (Mandala, Thangka colors) meets Swiss International Style (Grid, Typography).
Emotion: Safety, Awe, Serenity. The UI should feel like a reliable Sherpa guide.
Content: Photography is the hero. Text is the guide.
Texture: Use subtle grain and paper textures to avoid 'SaaS flatness'.
anti_patterns: No pure black (#000000) or pure white (#FFFFFF).
No gradients on text unless it's a specific brand moment.

usage_rules.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-light tracking-tight leading-none font-heading text-primary-900
usage_rules.h2: text-3xl md:text-5xl font-normal tracking-tight font-heading text-primary-800
usage_rules.caption: text-xs uppercase tracking-widest font-accent font-bold text-slate-400

typography.installation: Import 'Cormorant Garamond' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-[#003893] text-white hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-200 shadow-lg shadow-blue-900/20
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 transition-colors
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-lg text-slate-600 hover:text-[#003893] hover:bg-blue-50
buttons.sos: h-16 w-16 rounded-full bg-[#DC143C] text-white animate-pulse shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(220,20,60,0.5)] flex items-center justify-center font-bold text-xl z-50 fixed bottom-8 right-8

cards.glass: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/40 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/50 rounded-2xl p-6
cards.solid: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-md rounded-2xl p-6
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-white shadow-sm hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 border border-slate-100

inputs.default: h-12 bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-[#003893] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-100 rounded-lg transition-all

motion.parallax: Use 'framer-motion' useScroll and useTransform for hero sections.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #1A1A1A on light backgrounds. Use font-medium (500) for white text on colored buttons.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add @import for Cormorant Garamond and Manrope in index.css immediately.
2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Configure the colors in tailwind.config.js to match the 'colors' section above.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'radius-md' to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' to match the friendly/organic vibe.
4. MAP INTEGRATION: For the MapPage, ensure the Leaflet container has 'z-0' and overlays use the 'glass' card style defined above.
5. SOS BUTTON: This must be a global floating action button (FAB) visible on all mobile views, but unobtrusive on desktop.
6. DASHBOARDS: Use the 'dashboard_dense' grid. Keep it clean, white backgrounds, subtle borders. No heavy shadows for data.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash/Pexels URLs. Do not use placeholders.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
